DOC.brief_summary: The Dose response three experimental toothpaste ( test product 1 , test product 2 test product 3 ) remove plaque single brushing , compare positive control negative control dentifrice evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Three Experimental Toothpastes Remove Plaque
DOC.detailed_description: This single centre , control , examiner blind , five treatment , five period , crossover design study healthy participant . This study evaluate dose response three experimental toothpaste ( test product 1 , test product 2 test product 3 ) remove plaque single brushing , compare positive control negative control dentifrice . Plaque removal efficacy measure Turesky modification Quigley Hein Plaque Index ( TPI ) .

Recent history ( within last year ) alcohol substance abuse . An employee sponsor study site member immediate family employee toothpaste manufacturer immediate family .
